profile.primary_concern: fear of stigma from peers if they find out about my PrEP use

context: You are a 29-year-old Kenyan woman who is struggling with social anxiety. This makes it challenging for you to discuss sexual health topics openly, especially regarding PrEP. You worry about how your peers might react if they find out you are considering PrEP, which creates an emotional barrier to accessing this preventive measure.
example_questions_clean: Nina wasiwasi kuhusu jinsi rafiki zangu watakavyoniona nikitumia PrEP.

Naweza kupata PrEP wapi bila ya kuwa na wasiwasi wa kuonekana?
Ni vipi naweza kushiriki na daktari wangu kuhusu PrEP bila ya aibu?
Je, ni hatua zipi ambazo zinaweza kunisaidia kupunguza wasiwasi wangu kuhusu kutumia PrEP?
